item.title: BPE Tokenization Demystified: Implementation and Examples
item.description: A taxonomy of tokenization methodsIn NLP, one crux of problems is - how to tokenize the text. There are three methods available: Char-level Word-level Subword-level Let’s talk about the Char-level tokenizer. That is, we tokenize the text into a char stream. For instance, highest -> h, i, g, h, e, s, t. One advantage of the Char-level tokenizer is that the size of Vocab won’t be that large. The size of Vocab is equal to the size of the alphabet.
